title: DDR Day Events Schema
description: Schema for structured extraction of Daily Drilling Report operations into machine-readable events.

wellbore.description: Wellbore name as stated in the DDR header.

date.description: Date of the report in YYYY-MM-DD format.

start_time.description: Start time of operation in HH:MM format.

end_time.description: End time of operation in HH:MM format.

activity_raw.description: Original main-sub activity classification from DDR.

remark.description: Narrative engineering remark describing the operation.

end_depth_md.description: End depth in measured depth (mMD) if available.

event_type.description: Normalized event classification derived from activity and/or remark.
